definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The move is a step-change for the activists too.
sentences.chinese: 對於隱私維權者而言，此舉也代表着逐步的變化。

sentences.english: Innovative proposal to set up "market-oriented institutional investors rights protection."
sentences.chinese: 創新性的提出成立“市場化的投資者維權機構”。

sentences.english: The people-oriented concept should promote the cause of keeping peasants' rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 要用以人爲本理念推進農民維權事業。

sentences.english: The international community stepped in to build the boat. This is global solidarity.
sentences.chinese: 維權人士拉起風帆，國際社會造就航船，全球一心。

sentences.english: The right-maintaining ideas embody Zhang(Zhidong's) consciousness of nation's sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 讓利爭權的維權思想，體現了張之洞的國家主權意識。

sentences.english: At the same time, strengthening interdepartmental coordination, integrated solutions for workers rights protection issues.
sentences.chinese: 同時，加強部門間的協調，綜合解決農民工維權問題。

sentences.english: If think thought fors the time being, still have idea.
sentences.chinese: 假如想維權，還是有辦法的。

sentences.english: The very large proportion that notarial cost and retaining fee held our dimension authority to throw.
sentences.chinese: 公證費和律師費佔了我們維權投入的很大比例。

sentences.english: Now, before organization of puissant dimension authority is kidnapped by the interest.
sentences.chinese: 現在，以往的強力維權組織被利益綁架。

sentences.english: The whereabouts of over a dozen of other activists taken away by the police remain unknown.
sentences.chinese: 還有十多名被警方帶走的維權人士至今下落不明。

definition: complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
to file a complaint/to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc)/complaint/appeal
to handle/to take care of/to punish
